validationRules: block_id is required and must be unique 4-character hex string
hotspotImage.url is required for background image
pinlistRepeater must have at least 1 pin (array with _key for each item)
Each pin must have a _key field for React rendering
leftPos and topPos are numbers (20, not '20') representing percentages 0-100
pinType must be 'icon', 'image', or 'text'
When pinType='icon': pinIcon is required (Font Awesome class)
When pinType='image': pinImage.url is required
When pinType='text': pinText is required
DleftAuto/DrightAuto: only one can be true (position from left OR right, not both)
DtopAuto/DbottomAuto: only one can be true (position from top OR bottom, not both)
Tablet responsive: TabRespo must be true to use TleftPos, TtopPos, TrightPos, TbottomPos
Mobile responsive: MobRespo must be true to use MleftPos, MtopPos, MrightPos, MbottomPos
tipPlacement has 12 options: top/right/bottom/left with optional -start/-end suffixes
tipTriggers: 'mouseenter' (hover), 'click', 'focus', or 'manual'
tipTheme: 'light', 'dark', or 'translucent'
contEffect: 'normal_drop_waves', 'image_drop_waves', 'hover_drop_waves', or 'none'
tipInteractive requires tipTriggers='click' to be useful (keeps tooltip open)
followCursor creates dynamic tooltip positioning following mouse movement
tipMaxWidth is a number string (pixels) for tooltip width
tiprespo enables responsive tooltip widths (requires tiptabWidth and tipmobWidth)
Global styling (iconSize, pinWidth, etc.) applies to all pins of that type
Per-pin styling (piniconColor, pinBgcolor, etc.) overrides global styling
Hover overlay (hveOverlay=true) requires hvrBgoverlay background configuration
transfoemcss accepts any valid CSS transform string (e.g., 'scale(1.2) rotate(5deg)')
warnings: Don't use DleftAuto=true and DrightAuto=true simultaneously (conflict)
Don't use DtopAuto=true and DbottomAuto=true simultaneously (conflict)
Position values (leftPos, topPos) are percentages 0-100, not pixel values
Position defaults: leftPos=20, topPos=25 (when Auto flags are true)
Tablet/mobile positioning only works when TabRespo/MobRespo are enabled
followCursor tooltip follows mouse, which can be disorienting for users if overused
tipInteractive with tipTriggers='mouseenter' may cause tooltip to stay open unintentionally
HTML in tooltipText is allowed but must be properly escaped/sanitized
Wave effects (contEffect) add CSS animations that may affect performance with many pins
Global styling attributes apply to ALL pins of that type (icon/image/text)
Per-pin colors (piniconColor, etc.) don't require openBg or openTypography toggles
Tooltip responsive widths (tiprespo) require explicit px values for tablet/mobile
tipArrowColor must match tooltip background for seamless appearance
Hover overlay (hveOverlay) darkens the entire hotspot image, not individual pins
transfoemcss affects ALL pins on hover, not individual pins
Max 20-30 pins recommended for performance (too many can slow page load)
pinUrl makes the entire pin clickable, which may conflict with tooltip interaction
Accessibility: Always provide ariaLabel for pins, especially when using icons
Tooltip HTML content should be concise (max 2-3 lines) for best UX
commonMistakes: Using string '20' instead of number 20 for leftPos/topPos (should be numbers)
Setting both DleftAuto and DrightAuto to true (creates positioning conflict)
Forgetting to set TabRespo=true before using TleftPos/TtopPos
Forgetting to set MobRespo=true before using MleftPos/MtopPos
Using tipInteractive without tipTriggers='click' (doesn't work with hover)
Forgetting _key field in pinlistRepeater items (breaks React rendering)
Not setting itemTooltip=false when tooltip isn't needed (shows default tooltip)
Using tipMaxWidth without unit (should be number string like '300', not '300px')
Copying same _key for multiple pins (each pin needs unique _key: '0', '1', '2'...)
Not matching tipArrowColor with tipBg color (creates visual disconnect)
Using too many pins (20+) on mobile devices (causes performance issues)
Forgetting to set pinType when switching between icon/image/text pins
Using openTypography toggle for tooltip text (tooltipTypo doesn't require it in pin context)
Not testing responsive positioning on actual tablet/mobile devices
Using complex HTML in tooltipText without testing for overflow
bestPractices: Limit to 5-10 pins per hotspot image for best UX and performance
Use consistent pin styling (colors, sizes) across all pins for visual harmony
Always provide ariaLabel for accessibility (screen readers)

Use descriptive tooltipText with HTML formatting for clarity (,
, )
Test responsive positioning (TabRespo, MobRespo) on actual devices
Use tipPlacement strategically to avoid tooltip overflow off-screen
For clickable pins: Use tipTriggers='click' + tipInteractive=true
For hover pins: Use tipTriggers='mouseenter' (default)
Match tipArrowColor with tooltip background color for seamless integration
Use wave effects (contEffect) sparingly for subtle animation
For mobile: Reduce pin sizes and increase spacing to avoid tap conflicts
Use semantic HTML in tooltipText (headings, paragraphs, emphasis)
Provide alternative text/labels when using icon-only pins
Use hover states (piniconHvrColor, pinHvrBgcolor) to indicate interactivity
Test tooltip width (tipMaxWidth) to ensure content doesn't wrap awkwardly
Use image pins (pinType='image') for team photos or avatar markers
Use text pins (pinType='text') for numbered lists or step sequences
Use icon pins (pinType='icon') for feature callouts or annotations
Set responsive tooltip widths (tiprespo) for better mobile experience
Use follow cursor (followCursor=true) sparingly for special interactive effects
Document pin positions in comments (e.g., leftPos: 50 // center of image)
Use hover overlay (hveOverlay) for dramatic before/after reveals
Combine transfoemcss with box shadows for 3D lift effect on hover
Use gradient backgrounds (tipBg) for modern, eye-catching tooltips
Keep tooltip content concise (2-3 lines max) for scannable UX

responsivePatterns.description: Reposition pins for tablet portrait/landscape orientation
responsivePatterns.implementation: Set TabRespo=true, then provide TleftPos/TtopPos values that work better for tablet screens

responsivePatterns.description: Move pins to avoid overlap on small mobile screens
responsivePatterns.implementation: Set MobRespo=true, then provide MleftPos/MtopPos values with more spacing
responsivePatterns.example: Desktop topPos=30 → Mobile MtopPos=25 (shift up 5% to avoid content)

responsivePatterns.description: Reduce pin and icon sizes on smaller screens for better touch targets
responsivePatterns.implementation: Use responsive units in iconSize, pinWidth (md/sm/xs breakpoints)

responsivePatterns.description: Adjust tooltip width to fit mobile screens without overflow
responsivePatterns.implementation: Set tiprespo=true, provide tipMaxWidth (desktop), tiptabWidth (tablet), tipmobWidth (mobile)

accessibilityNotes: Always provide ariaLabel for each pin describing its purpose
Use semantic HTML in tooltipText (headings, paragraphs, lists)
Ensure sufficient color contrast in tooltips (WCAG AA: 4.5:1 for text)
Support keyboard navigation: tipTriggers='focus' for keyboard users
Don't rely solely on color to convey information (use icons + text)
Provide text alternatives for image pins (ariaLabel)
Test with screen readers to ensure tooltip content is announced
Use descriptive pinUrl link text when pins are clickable
Ensure tooltips are dismissible (Escape key should close)
Avoid auto-playing animations (contEffect='none' for accessibility mode)
performanceConsiderations: Limit to 10-15 pins per image (20+ can cause render lag)
Optimize hotspotImage size using WordPress imageSize parameter
Use wave effects sparingly (CSS animations consume resources)
Lazy load hotspot images for below-fold content
Minimize HTML in tooltipText (keep content lightweight)
Use icon pins instead of image pins when possible (smaller file size)
Optimize pinImage files to <50KB for image pins
Avoid followCursor on mobile (causes layout thrashing on touch)
Use CSS transforms (transfoemcss) instead of JS animations
Cache Tippy.js library for faster subsequent page loads
